name: Fluocinolone acetonide

indications.text: fluocinolone acetonide topical oil indicated treatment psoriasis scalp adults .

contraindications.text: fluocinolone acetonide topical oil topical . oral , ophthalmic , intravaginal . wet dampen hair scalp thoroughly . apply thin film fluocinolone acetonide topical oil scalp , massage well cover scalp supplied shower cap . leave overnight minimum 4 hours wash hair regular shampoo rinse thoroughly . daily needed . discontinue fluocinolone acetonide topical oil control disease achieved within 2 weeks , contact healthcare provider improvement seen within 2 weeks . fluocinolone acetonide topical oil face unless directed healthcare provider . apply intertriginous areas due increased risk local [ ( 6 ) ] . apply diaper area ; diapers plastic pants may constitute occlusive . [ ( 5.1 ) ]

warningsAndPrecautions: fluocinolone acetonide topical oil , 0.01 % ( scalp oil ) ( ndc 45802-485-26 ) supplied bottles containing 4 fluid ounces 2 shower caps . storage : keep tightly closed . store 20°-25°c ( 68°-77°f ) ; excursions permitted 15°-30°c ( 59°-86°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] .
indications_original: Fluocinolone acetonide topical oil is indicated for the treatment of psoriasis of the scalp in adults.
contraindications_original:
Fluocinolone acetonide topical oil is for topical use only. Not for oral, ophthalmic, or intravaginal use.
                  Wet or dampen hair and scalp thoroughly. Apply a thin film of fluocinolone acetonide topical oil on the scalp, massage well and cover scalp with the supplied shower cap. Leave on overnight or for a minimum of 4 hours then wash hair with regular shampoo and rinse thoroughly. Use daily as needed.
                  Discontinue fluocinolone acetonide topical oil when control of disease is achieved within 2 weeks, or contact the healthcare provider if no improvement is seen within 2 weeks.
                  Do not use fluocinolone acetonide topical oil on the face unless directed by the healthcare provider. Do not apply to intertriginous areas due to the increased risk of local adverse reactions [see Adverse Reactions (6)].
                  Do not apply to the diaper area; diapers or plastic pants may constitute occlusive use. [see Warnings and Precautions (5.1)]
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Fluocinolone Acetonide Topical Oil, 0.01% (Scalp Oil) (NDC 45802-485-26) is supplied in bottles containing 4 fluid ounces and with 2 shower caps.
                  Storage: Keep tightly closed. Store at 20°-25°C (68°-77°F); excursions permitted to 15°-30°C (59°-86°F) [see USP Controlled Room Temperature].
